title: Bangor, County Down
summary: Bangor (/ˈbæŋɡər/ BANG-gər;[2] from Irish: Beannchar [ˈbʲaːn̪ˠəxəɾˠ])[3] is a town in County Down, Northern Ireland. It is a seaside resort on the southern side of Belfast Lough and within the Belfast Metropolitan Area. It functions as a commuter town for the Greater Belfast area, which it is linked to by the A2 road and the Belfast–Bangor railway line. Bangor is situated 13.6 miles (22 km) east from the heart of Belfast. The population was 61,011 at the 2011 Census.[4]
